title: I CANT FIND MYSTERY SKINS:(
body:
Hi Guys today i bought so RP to self mystery skin my self but i didn't show up....
I thought it said it was permanently staying
Any thoughts

replies.body:
[They didn't say it was permanently staying.](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/may-bundles-mystery-skins-and-mystery-chest-returns) Mystery Gifting was permanently staying, but not self Mystery Gifting. Specifically,

>Mystery Chests are back as a new permanent feature in the Gifting Center of the store [no mention of self gifting]. Mystery Chests cost 790 RP, but guarantee your pals a Mystery skin worth 975 RP or more. And from now **through 16:59 AEST May 28**, youâ€™ll be able to purchase Mystery Chests for yourself also!

Remember to read everything twice before pouring money into it.
